cards.name: Slacking Off
cards.text: +1 morale. You and another player of your choice lose 0.1 GPA.

cards.name: Broken Bike
cards.text: You may only use movement cards worth 1 or 2 spaces next turn.

cards.name: Car Wreck
cards.text: Flip a coin. If heads, -50 money. If heads, +50 money, -1 preparation. In both cases, skip your next turn.

cards.name: Overslept!
cards.text: Roll a D6. <=3, nothing happens. >3, lose 1 preparation.

cards.name: A Bad Grade
cards.text: -1 preparation.

cards.name: Alone for the Weekend
cards.text: -1 morale.

cards.name: Eating Out
cards.text: -15 money.

cards.name: Tuition Fees
cards.text: All players lose 20 money.

cards.name: A Terrible Grade
cards.text: -2 preparation

cards.name: Out of Toilet Paper
cards.text: You can’t move next turn (but can still play cards).

cards.name: Unexpected Expense
cards.text: -20 money.

cards.name: Wrong Side of the Bed
cards.text: -1 morale

cards.name: Lost
cards.text: Move back 1 space, end your turn.

cards.name: Locked Out:
cards.text: Choose One: -10 money or you can’t move next turn.

cards.name: Miss the Buss
cards.text: Roll a D6. <=3, nothing happens, >3, -1 preparation.

cards.name: Power Outage
cards.text: Discard a random card from your hand.

cards.name: Peer Evaluations
cards.text: All other plays roll a D6, take the average value. <=3, nothing happens. >3, -0.1 GPA.

cards.name: Internet Drop
cards.text: If your preparation is 0, lose 0.1 GPA.

cards.name: Pop Quiz
cards.text: If your morale < 5, lose 1 preparation.

cards.name: Misunderstood
cards.text: -10 money for each Evil you have.

cards.name: Food Poisoning!
cards.text: If you have >2 evil, lose 1 preparation.

cards.name: Roommate Fight
cards.text: For every Evil you have, lose 1 Morale.

cards.name: Procrastination
cards.text: For every Evil you have, lose 1 preparation.

cards.name: Sick Day
cards.text: For every Evil you have, lose 15 money.

cards.name: Security Inspection
cards.text: If you have any Backstreet cards in hand, those cards are discarded and you are sent to Office Hours.

cards.name: Get Mugged
cards.text: -20 money, -1 prep

cards.name: Break a Leg
cards.text: Your cards have their movement values halved for your next turn.

cards.name: Blackout Drunk
cards.text: Have the player with the least Evil take your next turn.
